statements: DELETE FROM mapping_information WHERE latitude = 40.7128 AND longitude = -74.0060;
DELETE FROM mapping_information WHERE map_id = 100 AND road_type = 'Highway';
DELETE FROM mapping_information WHERE latitude > 40.123456 AND traffic_signs->>'speed_limit' = '50';

DELETE FROM Vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND color = 'Red';
